ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The authors thank the Australian Awards PhD Scholarship from the Australian Governmentâ€™s Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade awarded to the first-named author. We are grateful to CopRice Feeds Cobden, Victoria, Australia for the production of experimental pelleted feeds to specification. Thanks to Stephen Ives, Rowan Smith, Andrew Bailey, John Cavalieri, Lisa Manley, Claire Blackwood, John Otto and Aaron Flakemore for their editorial, technical, laboratory and logistical assistance during and after the feeding trial.
